home.subtitle: Your ultimate platform for connecting with tennis players, booking courts, and joining the tennis community.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Set up your tennis profile with skill level, preferred playing times, and game styles.

step2.title: Find Players & Courts
step2.description: Discover tennis partners near you and book courts at your favorite locations.

step3.title: Play & Connect
step3.description: Meet up for matches, join events, and become part of the tennis community.

findPartners.title: Find Tennis Partners
findPartners.description: Connect with players near you based on skill level, location, and playing style.

bookCourts.title: Book Courts
bookCourts.description: Reserve tennis courts at your favorite locations with our easy booking system.

playBulletin.title: Play Bulletin
playBulletin.description: Post or respond to play requests from other tennis enthusiasts in your area.

joinEvents.title: Join Events
joinEvents.description: Participate in tournaments, clinics, and social tennis events near you.

communities.title: Tennis Communities
communities.description: Join local tennis communities and connect with like-minded players.

courtFinder.title: Court Finder
courtFinder.description: Discover tennis courts in your area with detailed information and amenities.

newToTennis.title: New to Tennis?
newToTennis.description: Start by finding beginner-friendly players and courts in your area. Use our skill level filters to connect with players at your level.

quickGame.title: Looking for a Quick Game?
quickGame.description: Check the Play Bulletin for immediate playing opportunities or post your own request for a hitting partner.

competitive.title: Competitive Player?
competitive.description: Join tournaments and competitive events. Connect with advanced players and participate in league play.

community.title: Join Our Tennis Community
community.subtitle: Connect Beyond the Court
community.description: MatchPoint isn't just about finding games ‚Äì it's about building lasting connections with fellow tennis enthusiasts. Join local communities, share tips, organize group events, and be part of a vibrant tennis network.

benefits.shareTips: Share tips and improve your game
